description:
Centrally manage one or more PRTG installations with the PRTG app for desktop. The PRTG app for desktop is a native application that allows you to manage multiple PRTG servers.

The PRTG app for desktop is an alternative interface that you can use to connect to one or several independent PRTG core servers or PRTG Hosted Monitor instances to configure your setup, view monitoring results, and keep an eye on your network. It is a cross-platform application for fast access to data and monitoring management.
Changed
- We removed the Preview release channel. Future updates are only possible on the Stable release channel.
Fixed
- We fixed a rare crash that occurs when you delete multiple objects at once.
- We fixed an issue that occurred when you restore the device tree after restarting the application.
- We improved the stability in network requests.
- We fixed a rare crash when navigating through windows.
- We fixed an edge case issue with file dialogs on macOS that deleted the configuration.
- We fixed a crash that was related to notification sounds.
- We fixed an issue in MultiBoard Dashboard Widgets navigation.
